title: What are some good laid back alternative rock songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm going to do something kind of unorthodox here and name five songs from only one band. School of Fish was a GREAT alternative rock band in the early 90’s, and they are tragically underrated. They recorded two albums, a self titled debut, and their second album “Human Cannonball”. Both are great, but I probably like their debut a little better. They do have a few louder rocker type songs, but you said laid back. Their music, to me, is very unique, beautiful, melancholy, wistful even, at times. Their incredibly talented singer, Josh Clayton-Felt, tragically passed away in 2000 after a battle with an aggressive cancer. He had a very unique voice, and the music lives on. Here’s my five picks for “laid back.” Keep in mind, laid back could also be sad too. Ha. Let me know what you think. Take care. Speechless - “School of Fish”Under the Microscope - “School of Fish”Euphoria - “School of Fish”Fountain - “Human Cannonball”3 Strange Days - “School of Fish”

Queens of the Stone Age - Little SisterThe Dandy Warhols - Bohemian Like YouPearl Jam - I Am MineR.E.M. - End Of The WorldMad Season - Wake UpScreaming Trees - Look At YouCandlebox - YouWeezer - Island In The SunLive - Lightning Crashes
